item.description: Join us on Saturday, November 19, from 10:30 a.m. until 12:00 noon. for a hike in Woodbridge followed by an optional lunch. We will meet at Fitzgerald Trails which is located at 100 Center Road in Woodbridge, Connecticut, and there’s plenty of parking at the Woodbridge Town Library at 10 Newton Road. We will meet on the trail next to the intersection of Center Rd (Route 114) and Beecher Rd. Plan on arriving before 10:30AM. It will be an easy hike, but since we will be going through a wooded area, you should wear long pants, long sleeves, and a hat and bring insect repellent.The event will be canceled in the event of rain. If in doubt about the weather, contact Manny Ratafia: e-mail: manny@ratafias.com, hm 203-387-7348, mobile 203-901-9553 or Nina Stein  hm 203-757-2539, mobile 203-215-0022 or Marsha Zellner hm 203-393-2816, mobile 203-494-3856.
item.name: Hike in Woodbridge
